content.onCreate:
setVar("script_1","rc","midi:RC600")
send ('127.0.0.1:8080','/knock_knock')
setVar ("script_1",'cpt',0)
set ("input_1"," "); 
set ('textarea_19',1)
set ('Program change',40)

par noire)

widgets.label: auto

widgets.onCreate:
set ("script_2",0)
 setVar ("script_1","rc","midi:RC600")
  let a = window.performance.now()
  setVar("this","seconde",a)
  setVar("this","cpt",0)

widgets.label: auto
auto

widgets.onValue:
set ('textarea_4',Math.round(value)+70) 
set ("textarea_3",' ')
   //setVar ("script_1","rc"," ")
   setVar ('Tap tempo manuel','byp','false')
   setVar ("Envoi tempo par tap","byp",'false')
   setVar ("Envoi tempo par F8","byp",'false')
   
   setTimeout (majtemp,2000)

function majtemp()
{
  setVar ('script_1','cpt',0)
  setVar ('Tap tempo manuel','byp','true')
  setVar ("Envoi tempo par tap","byp",'true')
  setVar ("Envoi tempo par F8","byp",'true')
}

widgets.label: auto
auto
auto
widgets.onValue:
setVar('this','ok',false)
set('Armer',0)
setVar ('script_1','cpt',0)
setVar('script_1','demarre','true')
setVar('script_1','allume','true')
send ('midi:RC600','/sysex','B5','40','7F')
send ('midi:RC600','/sysex','B5','48','0')
setVar('Dub','ok3',true)

widgets.label: auto
widgets.onValue:
if (get('Dub') === 1)
{
set ('Dub',0)
}

set ('Armer',0)
send ('midi:RC600','/sysex','B5','4A','7F')
setVar('script_1','allume','false')
setVar('Stop','ok',false)
setVar('Dub','ok3',false)
setVar('Undo','ok4',false)
setVar('Armer','ok2',true)
